Cook chicken over a drizzle of oil with spices of choice

instructions: Trim and cut zucchini into quarter
Zest lemon and cut into wedges
Cook chicken in pan with Italian seasoning
Simmer stock concentrate, lemon zest, and lemon juice
Stir together spaghetti, zucchini, sour cream, butter, and chicken
Lemon Spaghetti Chicken.name: Lemon Spaghetti Chicken

instructions: Add diced pepper to beef when mostly cooked
Simmer sauce in pasta pot when done
Pasta and Beef.name: Pasta and Beef

instructions: Place the bell pepper halves in a baking dish.
Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add the quinoa, black beans, corn, chili powder, cumin, smoked paprika, salt, and black pepper. Cook for an additional 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and stir in the cheese.
Fill each bell pepper half with the quinoa mixture.
Bake for 25 minutes, or until the peppers are tender.
Vegetarian Stuffed Peppers.name: Vegetarian Stuffed Peppers
Vegetarian Stuffed Peppers.notes:
- 4 bell peppers, halved and seeded
- 1 tablespoon olive oil
- 1 onion, diced
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 cup cooked quinoa
- 1 cup cooked black beans
- 1 cup corn
- 1 teaspoon chili powder
- 1 teaspoon cumin
- 1/2 teaspoon smoked paprika
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
- 1/2 cup shredded cheese
